message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $140 for it. This price reflects the quality and utility of the product while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, $140 is a bit more than I'm comfortable paying at this time.  I'm willing to pay $125 for it.  This price is fair considering the value it holds for me and allows for a reasonable profit margin for you. Let me know your thoughts.
